solution_line_template: {children_ferris_wheel} children rode the Ferris wheel at ${cost_ferris_wheel_per_child} reach for a total of {children_ferris_wheel}*${cost_ferris_wheel_per_child} = $<<{children_ferris_wheel}*{cost_ferris_wheel_per_child}={cost_ferris_wheel}>>{cost_ferris_wheel}

{total_children} children rode the merry-go-round at ${cost_merry_go_round_per_child} each for a total of {total_children}*${cost_merry_go_round_per_child} = $<<{total_children}*{cost_merry_go_round_per_child}={cost_merry_go_round}>>{cost_merry_go_round}

{total_children} children bought {cones_per_child} cones of ice cream each at ${cost_cone} per cone for a total of {total_children}*{cones_per_child}*${cost_cone} = $<<{total_children}*{cones_per_child}*{cost_cone}={cost_ice_cream}>>{cost_ice_cream}
